fr.epita.iam.services

Class JDBCIdentityDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.epita.iam.services.JDBCIdentityDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.epita.iam.services.IdentityDAO

    public class JDBCIdentityDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements fr.epita.iam.services.IdentityDAO
    This is a class that contains all the database operations for the class Identity Here change the database properties based on your configurations which i have given in identities.sql file 
      JDBCIdentityDAO dao = new JDBCIdentityDAO();
  // save an identity
  dao.save(new Identity(...));
  
  //search with an example criteria (qbe)  
  dao.search(new Identity(...);
    warning this class is dealing with database connections, so beware to release it through the releaseResources()
    Author:
    Ramya

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JDBCIdentityDAO()
      Instantiates a new JDBC identity DAO.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(fr.epita.iam.datamodel.Identity identity)
      This method is to delete the idetity record based on the given ID Here first we try to search weather there is a record in the database exists with the given ID or not If exists then we will try to delete otherwise we will throw an exception.
      void releaseResources()
      this is releasing the database connection, so you should not use this instance of DAO anymore.
      void save(fr.epita.iam.datamodel.Identity identity)
      This method is to save the identity details into the database.
      java.util.List<fr.epita.iam.datamodel.Identity> search(fr.epita.iam.datamodel.Identity criteria)
      * This method is to search the database based on the given id.
      void update(fr.epita.iam.datamodel.Identity identity)
      This method is to update the identity information based on the given id Here first we try to search weather there is a record in the database exists with the given ID or not If exists then we will try to update otherwise we will throw an exception.
